Texto: 
pfts:
1) restrictive pattern.
2) decreased dlco.
1) old studies (2001) -
1a) plain film - fine to medium reticular pattern, greater in the bases. 
1b) corresponding hrct single axial image - interlobular septal thickening, peripheral honeycombing. (ground glass appearance not well represented on select image but highly characteristic). 
2) new study - 08 oct 2003 -   
2a) plain film - coarse reticular patterning generalized throughout both lungs. low lung volumes bilaterally. no evidence of bullous change.
uip - usual interstitial pneumonia
1) acute interstitial pneumonia
2) desquamative interstitial pneumonia
3) bronchiolitis obliterans organizing pneumonia (boop)
4) respiratory bronchiolitis-associated interstitial lung disease
5) non-specific interstitial pneumonia
6) rheumatoid lung disease
7) other autoimmune inflammatory lung diseases (sle, polymyositis/dermatomyositis, ankylosing spondylitis, scleroderma)
8) hypersensitivity pneumonitis
9) asbestosis
10) sarcoid
54 year old woman with dyspnea and abnormal (restrictive pattern) pulmonary function testing.
